name: Saturday Grocery Store Adventure
description:
[beta version]

It's Saturday morning and you decide to go grocery shopping! In this Choose-Your-Own-Adventure style text game, you are in control of how the day's events play out. It is recommended that you play through the story multiple times to find out about everything that happened on this weird Saturday.

~Future Updates~

  • Illustrations
  • Six End Title Cards
  • (maybe) sound
